text: Hi, how much do you like to donate to the charity now
I would definitely donate because I often donate to charities
This donation will go to Save the children
This is a worthy organization because many children receive some benefits
Can you specify the amount of donation
I would donate $10 to this charity
ok fine. The research team would collect the donations
ok great-who is the research team?
The researxh team will contact you
Ok-thanks-I will be waiting to hear from them
Fine anything you want to know about the Save the children
I have seen information about this organization before
To brief you again Save  the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
Yes, it is a worthy organization and I do believe that it helps in many substantial ways.
Donation to this organisation is essential to help ensuring children's rights to health, education, safety, etc.
The donations to heal and help with health issues is very crucial
For instance, millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence.
Yes- the war in Syria had traumatized many children
In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence.
yes, I think I have told about my donation and now waiting for the conversation to end.  Thanks.
